author: AFP
title: Asia virus latest: Japan may declare emergency, Singapore quarantines dorms
description: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is reportedly set to make the declaration for parts of Japan including Tokyo, as the number of people infected with the virus continues to increase. The news pushed up Tokyo stocks, with investors seeing the move as positive for cont…
content:
SINGAPORE: Here are the latest developments in Asia related to the coronavirus pandemic:
The Japanese government may declare a state of emergency this week to contain the coronavirus outbreak, media reports said.
